item.description:
Hi Everybody!!!!

Well, I've got sort of bad news! This German American Club that I found online under bars and restaurants is A PRIVATE CLUB, which means we can't meet there on Thursday!! Sorry about that, guys - I should have investigated this a little better!!!

So chance in location: We will meet at the Tazza Cafe on 250 Westminster St. in Providence, RI 02903, instead! I hope that is ok for everyone!!! I look forward to seeing everyone who rsvp:d "yes". See ya on Thursday at 7 p.m.!!

Take care until then!

Macht's gut,

Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have something "German" with us for all the Newbies to recognize us!!
item.why: You will love this group, because we are a bunch of really interesting great people, fun to hang out with and we welcome everybody, who speaks, wants to learn to speak, wants to practice speaking German or who just wants to check us out for fun!
item.name: Changed location for Thursdays meetup!!!
